text.name: info
text.text:
Manufacturer: Nintendo
Released: 1996
Units sold: 32.93 million
Best-selling game: Super Mario 64
CPU: 64-bit NEC VR4300 (MIPS R4300i) @ 93.75 MHz
RAM: 4 MB Rambus RDRAM (8 MB with Expansion Pak)
Graphics: SGI "Reality Coprocessor" @ 62.5 MHz
Sound: 16-bit, 48 or 44.1 kHz stereo
